title: Korashime Heya, Ritsu Chi Iririo Kinzu.
alternative_title: Punishment Room, No Entry ; こらしめ部屋、立チ入リヲ禁ズ。 ; 징벌의 방, 출입 금지
status: Punishment Room, No Entry ; こらしめ部屋、立チ入リヲ禁ズ。 ; 징벌의 방, 출입 금지
description:
Description :
        Kurobayashi Tsumugi, who harbors guilt towards his family, flees to an old temple hidden deep inside a sparsely populated village.  At the temple, he discovers a room called the "Punishment Room" with a sign labeled "No Entry". Inside this Punishment Room, Tsumugi finds a notebook titled "Punishment List" where the crimes and allotted punishments of the villagers have been recorded.  Tsumugi, who quickly envisions himself as the villagers receiving these punishments, lights up a match and brings it to his penis, engulfing himself in pleasure...
